data.meta_description: Learn why open architecture is the future of access control, and how Mercury controllers create seamlessly secure experiences.
data.text:
Open Architecture

Opens Doors

Access control systems need to be ready for anything — from changing industry standards to emerging tech to your next big idea. Mercury’s adaptable hardware and open-architecture environment ensure you’ll be prepared for whatever the future holds.

EXPLORE PRODUCTS

ACCESS CONTROL PRODUCTS

Mercury Controllers: The Backbone of Access Control Systems

Mercury Intelligent Controllers are the most proven and reliable hardware in the industry. Our controllers let you integrate disparate systems into one unified solution for enhanced security, efficient management and innovative building capabilities. Mercury’s open architecture is the key to ensuring flexibility, increased ROI, scalability, and cybersecurity throughout the life cycle of an access control system.

VIEW CONTROLLERS

PARTNERS

Partnering with the Best in Security and Access Control

We work with a vast ecosystem of innovative partners to ensure we’re creating access control hardware that’s reliable, robust and ready for anything. Mercury has partnered with OEMs and Fortune 500 companies to develop and refine systems for reliability and longevity for over thirty years — and counting!

VIEW PARTNERS

SUPPORT

We’re Here for You

When you have questions about access control, turn to us for answers. Whether you need controller how-to’s, white papers, FAQs or the help of an actual human, our Mercury team of access control experts have you covered.

GET SUPPORT

ABOUT

Who Is Mercury?

With over 5 million Authentic Mercury controllers sold to partners worldwide, Mercury has the largest installed base in the industry. We also have the greatest accumulated runtime of any access control hardware provider. But everything we do here at Mercury isn’t designed for our success—it’s designed to help you succeed, well into the future. Find out more about what makes us tick and the folks who are leading the charge.
